name: Edmond's Illness
description:
There's something wrong with Edmond. Can the cells in his body defeat the virus that is attacking him?

Instructions
  • Drag the cells around
  • White blood cells destroy germs
  • Germs eat red blood cells
  • Avoid hitting the crust that is building up in Edmon's immune system

This was my entry for Ludum Dare

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-30/?action=preview&uid=28360
